instructions:
Mix cocoa and espresso with 130g boiling water then add 2oz chopped chocolate until it melts. Then add melted butter, oil, eggs/yolks, and vanilla before incorporating sugar. Finally fold in flour and salt and then remaining chocolate cut into pieces.

Bake in a lined 9x13 at 350F for 30-35 minutes and let cool 10 minutes before removing and cooling for another 1-2 hrs before cutting.
name: Box Brownies
